values:
SNOW BALL WAS SOOOO FUN!!! yeah, i had alot of fun last night at the snow ball!!! i didnt really dance...(isnt that weird considering im a dancer?) but i did have fun. i feel bad for ginger rodgers. she had to dance backwards and in heels...i only had to dance in heels, but it was hard as hell. whatever. i found out that nick can dance. isnt that a crazy fuckin surprise. i also found out that ashley cant dance...but she just dosnt try. i made her dance in the end. cory look sooo sharp with his hair like that tho...he should wear it like that all the time *cough-hint-cough*. 

everybody looked so good tho...in their nice black dresses. and then there is me who showed up in a red dress...whatever, i stuck out and people noticed me. 

i had sooo much fun last nite and im tired as hell. i still have rehearsal tho and life goes on.

love always,

shaina

im soo sry i havnt written in a while...to busy and psycotic to even think about anything. idk whats wrong with me...i cant sleep, im really fuckin hungry and i cry ALL the time!!!

"Like an Eagle"-first verse and tag:
now,
is the time,
to follow the wind,
to walk alone.
and a star,
will show the way.
above the clouds,
beyond the sea.

and now,
is the time,
now and farewell,
and as we part,
u taught me well,
u gave me strength, 
u set me free,
ill not forget u.

thats from "like an eagle". the pretiest chorus song that we have ever sung in our whole chorus history.
its the kinda song u would sing if u were high or something, lol!
sing sing sing!!!

*sigh* im in one of my "famous shaina moods" again. im really mellow. i think its time to makes some new room plans. im redecorating Mandi's room for her. my first real project!! i make designs all the time but i never have anywhere to put them, mean i have no room in my house. i'm gonna go draw out some blue prints. before i go tho, im gonna right down this simple little quiz about myself that u have to answer for me.

either/or-
apples or oranges?
tall or short?
black or white?
jewish or christian?
lesbian or strait?
single or taken?
bitchy or friendly?
popular or normal or dorky?
normal or frumpy?

my favorites-
my favorite ice cream is:
my favorite color is:
my favorite person in the world is:
my favorite singer/band is:
my favorite type of music is:
my favorite past time is:
my favotite show is:
my favorite body part is:
my favorite muscle is:

who is/what is?-
the person who i hate the most in the world:
my taste in men is?
my best friend?
my worst enemy is:

ok im done. u better all fill this out or i wont know what u think about me.

i have finally stopped crying about amy, and i think its time to move on now. im really stressed out tho. i have put WAY too much on my plate this year and i really need to find some priorities...and fast! i dont know what happened the other day, but i was doing my homework, and i just broke down crying. i think i had like an anxiety attack or something. imm WAY too stressed out to keep doing everything, but i'm not a quitter and i never have been.
its really hard for me to give up on soemthing that i have started, even when i hate it entirely. school has also taken a big turn for me. i finally realized that im never going to b an actress or a dancer or a singer. im just not good enough. i may have the heart, but my skills dont match up. i really need to bring my grades up because i have to get into a good school. grrr...i hate school. but im gonna have to deal and do good in it because i think i might have to turn to interior design after all. well i gotta split and go binge on some food. lets just hope i dont throw up!
http://sexy-banana-7.livejournal.com/2746.html

Today Amy died. she didnt deserve to tho. in a way im kinda happy that she died because she was in so much pain. but the feeling inside me that im never gonna c her again is still stabbing me like a knife in my heart. i dont think i have ever met another person as nice or as kind as she was. even in her pain she was always thinking of someone else, not herself. i wish that i had been like amy last week. i was supposed to go and visit her, but i never went because i was too busy thinking of myself, rather than thinking of others who needed me. i didnt even get to say goodbye.

remember not to think of yourself, but to think of others in their time of need. i didnt...and look what happened.

shaina
http://sexy-banana-7.livejournal.com/2428.html

put on ur yarmulka! its time for hannuka! smoke some marajanukka, to celebrate hannuka! actually hannuka is over, but i have decided to keep the spirit up for 2004! hahaha! lets all make the world a happier place this year! lets talk things over with our enemies and solve our problems like adults. yeh right! who am i kiddin. im finally awake and ready. now all i have to do is get into the shower and get ready to do stuff out side of the house in the real world. there is only one day of vacation left and that makes me REALLY mad because it didnt get to do anything. and it also makes me mad cuz i have to deal with Ms. McMaster's voice. chelsea and i make fun of her all the time in class, right in front of her face.
what i dont understand is how she can stand her own voice. the rest of the world can't, i dont know how she can. I'm going to see the Wizard of Oz tonight at Seacoast Rep. i know almost every one in it. i get to c my little JM and my Arielle tonight too! i love them both to the max! if i ever had children,(highly unlikely), but if i ever do, i want them to be just like JM and Arielle! well gotta split and go talk to Ashley on the phone about what to wear today! bye bye!

love always,
shaina

ho hum deedley dumm...wow im kinda tired. rite now im trying to figure out mandi's new phone number, its changing all the time! i can never reach her unless she calls me! its reallly weird. i have caller ID on my phone, but of course, she has a private number, just like me and the rest of my friends. *sigh*
me and mandi, if i can ever reach her, r going to go to the mall. im gonna ask her mom if she can fix my damn eye brows when im there too. she's really good at that stuff. im sooo bored and i can't find her number anywhere!!!im gonna ask her to pick out what to wear tonite too. i have no idea...im too blah to figure it out. well gotta split! HAPPY NEW YEARS!

dont drink too much!
shaina

boo hoo,

i feel like crap still. i cant find my anapprox. bad bad bad. however, im still very happy. really surprising actually! everyday that i have woken up this week i'v been happy...a very rare instince i assure u! well not when i have woken up, but after the 2nd cup-o-joe iv been really cheery. very strange.Alllright...
i get to go to Em's party tomorrow and i dont know what im gonna wear. she said to be comfortable, but i don't know HOW comfortable. u never know with me. u say comfy and i show up in sweat pants and every one else is in cocktail dresses. i don't know...maybe just kakhis or something... anyway i gotta split! bye bye!

lots of love,
shaina

today i feel like major crap. last nite i felt so gross and today i feel even groser...yucky!! tonite im going to the movies with my family and chelsea. boy is she in for a treat! she's never met my family...i hope she dosnt get scared and run away! wow! gotta keep the family on the low-low so that i dont totally freak her out. whatev she's already completely psycotic anyway.;)

well if im gona go tonite i gotta shower and pray the my parents dont embarass me.

lots of love,
shaina

yay! today i started a new live journal. i got bored with my other one, so i started this one, not like its going to be any more fun than my last one. last night i went to the movies with ashley. we saw somethings gotta give. wow, very boring movie. it was kinda funny tho. i wanna go c Elf. that looks good. i need more cheesy teen movies to come out soon. i like those...they actually make me laugh. i say i make an American Pie4. whatever...

im going to Em's new years party. im not really in a "get to know you" kind of state of mind this week. i hope i dont have to meet a lot of new people. i hate doing that... well gotta split and take a shower!

lots of love,
shaina
